post:
Hey!  
  
My name is Hassan and I am here from Hostodo.com to announce our new location- Dallas, TX! We are also now offering KVM virtual servers in this location. Asia Optimized IPv4 now available in Los Angeles, CA ONLY. 1 free Asia Optimized IPv4 per VPS, $2/each for additional IPs. Please contact our support team after purchase if you’d like an Asia Optimized IP on your VPS.

We do not allow any CPU intensive processes on our nodes, if you plan on using over 90% of a core for an extended period of time you will be suspended. Legal adult content, private VPNs, and private proxies are all allowed. BitCoin mining or similar is not allowed along with anything that is illegal in the United States. You can read our full Terms of Service at: https://hostodo.com/portal/knowledgebase.php?action=displayarticle&id=1
